oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allen, Alethia B., 1845 July 27
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Alethia B. Allen, dated July 27th, 1845. She was the daughter of the late Hon. Robert Allen and a member of 2nd Presbyterian Church. Her will was written via “word of mouth July 5th, one thousand eight hundred fifty-four,” signed by R. A. Lapsley and Jno. D. Kelly.” She is interred at the Nashville City Cemetery. Illustrates the first page of the document. Notation on verso: “Recorded in Book 16, Page 453.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen family
